unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya! Useful for farmers like Ramlal in Maharashtra. Had a bad monsoon season back in '21. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him. Registration deadline is 31/07/2024, 17:00 hrs. Is it worth the premium for paddy crop around Karnal this season? Thinking of insuring my field. Last year, lost Rs. 5000 due to untimely rain on 15/06/2023. Should consult my uncle at Krishi Vigyan Kendra at 10:00 hrs tomorrow. Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya! Useful for farmers like Ramlal in Maharashtra. Had a bad monsoon season back in twenty twenty one. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped him. Registration deadline is thirty first july two thousand and twenty four, five P M. Is it worth the premium for paddy crop around Karnal this season? Thinking of insuring my field. Last year, lost rupees five thousand due to untimely rain on fifteenth june two thousand and twenty three. Should consult my uncle at Krishi Vigyan Kendra at ten A M tomorrow. Jai Kisan!
